thread.title: Calvin Harris - Slide Feat. Frank Ocean & Migos
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris - Slide Feat. Frank Ocean & Migos

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Calvin Harris - Slide Feat. Frank Ocean & Migos
text: 0 MAKE IT STOP Listen Calvin Harris' new single "Slide" featuring Frank Ocean & Migos. If you follow Scottish DJ/hitmaker Calvin Harris on social media then you might’ve notice he’s been promoting the hell out of a new single with Frank Ocean & Migos over the past couple weeks, which has left fans & industry folks alike dying to hear. Thankfully, the wait is over and Calvin has finally released the official single tonight via Apple Music called “Slide,” which is expected to see life on Harris’ upcoming album due out later this year. Take a listen to the new collab and sound off in the comments (below). Does Calvin & company have themselves a new Summer smash or nah?
